basics.name: Angel Vivanco
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science, and am also studying for a minor in Mathmatics at Aurora University. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2021.

work.summary: Work in a team of computer specialists that provide computer, network, IT support to the Plano Community School District
highlights: Maintain, Update, and Provide any and all workers and students within the Plano School district with the necessary technology
Be able to provide on the spot help or quick fixes on any computer or technology issues that may occur
Respond to all helpdesk inquiries and requests in a timely manner.

work.summary: Work in a team in order to move stock from the storage room/area to the salesfloor and provide excellent coustomer assistance.
highlights: Answer customers' questions about merchandise and advise customers on merchandise selection.
Stock shelves, racks, cases, bins, and tables with new or transferred merchandise.
Receive, open, unpack and issue sales floor merchandise.Clean display cases, shelves, and aisles.

work.summary: Properly and respectfully take the customers orders as well to be able to work in a team to get any and all orders out in a well and timely manner.
highlights: Maintain sanitation, health, and safety standards in work areas; as well as keeping sanitation standards in prep and food stations
Maintained customer satisfaction, as well as continously helped customers frequently.

awards.title: Staff of the Month
awards.summary: In response for the hard work and time dedicated in projects in order for them to be completed within a single week.
